sentences.en: A great uniformity of work prevails over the wide expanse.
sentences.cn: 在这片广大土地上的工作是一种统一的伟大工作.

sentences.en: A vast expanse of golden crops lay before us.
sentences.cn: 我们眼前展现出一大片金黄色的庄稼.

sentences.en: Ahead lay a vast expanse of wheat.
An unwearied pall of cloud muffled the whole expanse of sky from zenith to horizon.
sentences.cn: 一望无际的云幕蒙住了从天顶到地平线的整个夜空.

sentences.en: Far in the distance lies the Dongting Lake , a vast expanse of misty , rolling waters.
sentences.cn: 远望洞庭, 烟波浩渺.

sentences.en: In 976 AD , the Babenberg dynasty was invested with parts of its expanse.
sentences.cn: 公元976年, 边区的若干部分作为领地赐给巴奔堡家族.

sentences.en: It completes its journey in the vast expanse of the Thousand - Islet Lake.
sentences.cn: 尽头处,有浩瀚的“千岛湖”.

sentences.en: It is a vast expanse of desert.
She overlooked the vast expanse from the tower.
sentences.cn: 她从塔上俯视茫茫大地.

sentences.en: The fields covered with snow became a vast expanse of whiteness stretching to infinity.
sentences.cn: 田野被大雪覆盖,白茫茫的一眼望不到边.

sentences.en: The Mandarin Oriental's pool is small in real life, suitable only for a quick dip… nothing like the vast, blue expanse of water in the marketing photo.
sentences.cn: 文华东方的游泳池在现实中是很小的，只适合快速浸泡一下......一点都不像宣传照片上那一大片宽阔的蓝色水域。

sentences.en: The Sahara is a vast expanse of desert.
sentences.cn: 撒哈拉是一片广袤无垠的沙漠.

sentences.en: The snowstorm swept the vast expanse of grassland.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪袭击了辽阔的草原.

sentences.en: This conservatory enjoys an enviable position overlooking a leafy expanse.
sentences.cn: 这个温室位置绝佳，放眼望去，草木繁茂，郁郁葱葱。

sentences.en: We gazed out over the limitless expanse of the desert.
sentences.cn: 我们凝望着那一片漫无边际的沙漠.

sentences.en: We have a vast expanse of cultivated land.

words.tran_cn: 扩张主义；扩张政策；膨胀主义
领土扩张论者；扩张主义者
扩大性；膨胀系数；可膨胀性

trans.tran_cn: 广阔的区域，扩张，展开，苍天
trans.tran_en: a very large area of water, sky, land etc
